Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at YVE Hotel Miami places you in the heart of Miami, walking distance from Bayside Marketplace and Island Queen Cruises. This hotel is close to Port of Miami and Vizcaya Museum and Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 243 guestrooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional features include wedding services and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Miami? This hotel has facilities measuring 1000 square feet (90 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

A stay at YVE Hotel Miami places you in the heart of Miami, walking distance from Bayside Marketplace and Island Queen Cruises. This hotel is close to Port of Miami and Vizcaya Museum and Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bayside Marketplace - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Island Queen Cruises - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Gusman Center for the Performing Arts - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Bayfront Park - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Freedom Tower - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Wallflower Gallery - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Miami Convention Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
American Airlines Arena - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Miami-Dade County Courthouse - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
HistoryMiami - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Port of Miami - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Bicentennial Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Perez Art Museum Miami - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts of Miami-Dade County - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Miami Children's Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for YVE Hotel Miami is Miami, FL (MIA-Miami Intl.) - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Continental Downtown Bayside - Port of Miami is Miami, FL (MIA-Miami Intl.) - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi.
